title: Slope field and Differential Equation part - b

content.question: While the slope field in part (a) is drawn at only twelve points, it is defined at every point in the xy-plane. Describe all point in the xy-plane for which the slopes are positive.

frqParts.text: While the slope field in part (a) is drawn at only twelve points, it is defined at every point in the xy-plane. Describe all point in the xy-plane for which the slopes are positive.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
